mapper.update: update IPO_SPECIALCOUNTERFEE set FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADEALGR = #{tradealgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUY = #{buy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELL = #{sell,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTERFEETYPE = #{counterfeetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, TRADEALGR, BUY, SELL, UPDATEDATE, USERID, COUNTERFEETYPE from IPO_SPECIALCOUNTERFEE
